msg: added more headers checked for whitelisting, thanks to Nancy McGough for the tip

author: jmason
msg: bug 1990: RCVD_FAKE_HELO_DOTCOM_2 work.  added T_NO_RDNS_DOTCOM_HELO to catch hosts HELOing as a big dot-com, with no reverse DNS

author: jmason
msg: bug 846: default whitelists not so easily forged anymore.  also added documentation on the trusted_networks inference option
